pr_title: (CDAP-16353) Replace ArtifactRepository param with PluginFinder for AbstractConfigurer…

timeline.author: yaojiefeng

timeline.bodyText: why do we need the change here and remove the ones in InMemoryProgramRunnerModule?
timeline.author: yaojiefeng

replies.bodyText: After the change, LocalApplicationManager used by AppFabric and PreviewApplicationManager used by Preview requires this binding. But Preview uses AppFabricServiceRuntime module, so have to move the binding to AppFabricServiceRuntimeModule to satisfy the need by both appfab and preview.
replies.author: wyzhang

timeline.bodyText: nit - these imports can be removed
timeline.author: yaojiefeng

timeline.message:
(CDAP-16353) Replace ArtifactRepository param with PluginFinder for AbstractConfigurer

Motivation:
AbstractConfigurer uses ArtifactRepository just to find the artifact for a given plugin,
this functionality is already provided by PluginFinder which has local and remote implementations,
thereby allowing us to use local impl when having shared SQL and remote version for non-shared
per service local levelDB.
